biotools.summary: A scalable and fully parallelized genome assembler designed for massive sequencing data. Intend of using traditional de Bruijn Graph, it adopts multi-step bi-directed graph (MSG). With MSG, the standard genome assembly (SGA) is equivalent to the edge merging operations in a semi-group.

bioschemas.name: SWAP-Assembler
bioschemas.summary: A scalable and fully parallelized genome assembler designed for massive sequencing data. Intend of using traditional de Bruijn Graph, it adopts multi-step bi-directed graph (MSG). With MSG, the standard genome assembly (SGA) is equivalent to the edge merging operations in a semi-group.
